name: No Yeast Pizza Dough - Vegan
description: Don't spend hours making pizza dough and try this easy vegan no-yeast pizza dough recipe for a quick pizza fix! Yeast-free Vegan Pizza Dough from scratch made out simple ingredients!

video.name: VEGAN NO YEAST PIZZA DOUGH | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
VEGAN NO YEAST PIZZA DOUGH 

Get the WRITTEN RECIPE here - https://www.veganricha.com/no-yeast-pizza-dough-vegan/

SUBSCRIBE HERE: https://www.youtube.com/veganricharecipes?sub_confirmation=1

Don’t spend hours making pizza dough and try this easy vegan no-yeast pizza dough recipe for a quick pizza fix! Yeast-free Vegan Pizza Dough from scratch made with simple ingredients! 15 mins!

Those of you who love homemade pizza as much as I do know that yeasted dough can take time and that’s why I created this quick Vegan Pizza Dough Recipe that uses NO yeast! Ain’t nobody got time for that dough to rise until doubled in size, right? Especially in winter, when it takes hours.

******MORE PIZZA RECIPES FROM THE BLOG******

PIZZA WITH CHIPOTLE RED LENTIL TOMATO SAUCE, BASIL AND VEGAN RICOTTA: https://www.veganricha.com/pizza-with-chipotle-red-lentil-tomato-sauce-basil-and-vegan-ricotta/

SRIRACHA BBQ TOFU PIZZA WITH PEPPER JACK ON SPELT CRUST: https://www.veganricha.com/bbq-tofu-pizza-with-pepper-jack/

BUFFALO CHICKPEA PIZZA WITH WHITE GARLIC SAUCE AND CELERY RANCH DRESSING: https://www.veganricha.com/buffalo-chickpea-pizza-white-garlic-sauce-celery-ranch-vegan-recipe/

Connect with me on Social Media:

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/VeganRicha

INSTAGRAM: https://instagram.com/veganricha

PINTEREST: https://www.pinterest.com/veganricha/

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/veganricha

Music: Epidemic Sound 
#veganricha #easyveganreecipes #veganpizza #veganpizzadough #pizzadough #noyeastpizza

recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup non-dairy milk (such as almond soy or light coconut)
1/2 tsp vinegar (, white vinegar or apple cider vinegar )
1 1/2 cup  flour (, I use unbleached all purpose )

recipeInstructions.text: Warm the water and non-dairy milk until lukewarm, mix in the extra virgin olive oil and vinegar
recipeInstructions.name: Warm the water and non-dairy milk until lukewarm, mix in the extra virgin olive oil and vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl mix in rest of the dried ingredients, until they are well combined
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl mix in rest of the dried ingredients, until they are well combined

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dried ingredients to the wet bowl and mix
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dried ingredients to the wet bowl and mix

recipeInstructions.text: Press and mix or use your hands to lightly knead. Depending on the nondairy milk and the flour used, you might need a tsp or so more water to get the dough together. As soon as the dough forms, bring it together and cover the bowl and let it sit for half an hour.(15 Mins if near a warm oven)
recipeInstructions.name: Press and mix or use your hands to lightly knead. Depending on the nondairy milk and the flour used, you might need a tsp or so more water to get the dough together. As soon as the dough forms, bring it together and cover the bowl and let it sit for half an hour.(15 Mins if near a warm oven)

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the dough from the bowl and spread it using a rolling pin or hands on a parchment lined baking sheet. use flour if dough is sticky to help spread. Use hands or roll it out.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the dough from the bowl and spread it using a rolling pin or hands on a parchment lined baking sheet. use flour if dough is sticky to help spread. Use hands or roll it out.

recipeInstructions.text: Put your favorite pizza sauce on top, veggies and vegan cheese or other toppings of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Put your favorite pizza sauce on top, veggies and vegan cheese or other toppings of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 425F (220C) for 16-18 minutes depending on the size of the pizza and thickness of the crust.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 425F (220C) for 16-18 minutes depending on the size of the pizza and thickness of the crust.

recipeInstructions.text: Broil for half a minute to brown if needed and then take the pizza out of the oven, let it sit for a minute and slice and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Broil for half a minute to brown if needed and then take the pizza out of the oven, let it sit for a minute and slice and serve.

keywords: no yeast pizza dough, pizza dough without yeast, yeast free pizza recipe
